resources.string:
# Default configuration file
# Certificates, key and identity #taskd.certificate = change-me.cert.pem #taskd.key = change-me.key.pem #taskd.ca = change-me.cert.pem #taskd.credentials = change-me/change-me/change-me
# Taskd server host and port #taskd.server = change-me:53589
# Optional include #include change-me
# Sync configuration (periodical/error/commit) #ui.sync.periodical = 120
